survey_name: Workplace Hybrid Meeting Tools Effectiveness Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to evaluate the effectiveness of hybrid meeting tools used by employees in a hybrid work environment to identify areas for improvement and optimize collaboration.

questions.question_text: Which hybrid meeting tools do you currently use for work?
questions.client_notes: Use a multi-choice format to allow selection of multiple tools. Include an 'Other' option with a text field for manual entry.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: MULTI_CHOICE with an optional text input for 'Other'.

script.question_text: Which hybrid meeting tools do you currently use for work?

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the overall performance of your primary hybrid meeting tool?
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for measuring satisfaction. Ensure the options are evenly balanced.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the overall performance of your primary hybrid meeting tool?

questions.question_text: What challenges do you face when using hybrid meeting tools?
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections and include an 'Other' option for additional feedback.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: MULTI_CHOICE with an optional text input for 'Other'.

script.question_text: What challenges do you face when using hybrid meeting tools?

questions.question_text: How often do technical issues disrupt your hybrid meetings?
questions.client_notes: Use a frequency scale to assess disruption levels. Ensure clear wording for consistency.

script.question_text: How often do technical issues disrupt your hybrid meetings?

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for your hybrid meeting tools?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture qualitative feedback. Limit response length to 500 characters.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: OPEN_TEXT with character limit.

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for your hybrid meeting tools?

questions.question_text: How important is seamless integration between your hybrid meeting tool and other workplace software (e.g., email, calendars, project management tools)?
questions.client_notes: Use an importance scale to gauge integration priorities.
